text:
In mod_auth_ldap are the parameterinits incorrect! 
AP_INIT_FLAG("AuthLDAPRemoteUserIsDN", ap_set_flag_slot,
             (void *)APR_OFFSETOF(mod_auth_ldap_config_t, user_is_dn),
OR_AUTHCFG,"...")

must be changend in
AP_INIT_FLAG("AuthLDAPRemoteUserIsDN", ap_set_flag_slot,
              (void *)APR_XtOffsetOf(mod_auth_ldap_config_t, user_is_dn),
OR_AUTHCFG,"...")

ronny
creator: rweb007@web.de

text:
The current CVS version of mod_auth_ldap is meant to work with the current CVS 
version of Apache.  What you're seeing is a change that was made recently to 
accomodate a change in APR.  If you need a version of mod_auth_ldap that works 
with 2.0.36, you'll have to revert these changes yourself or check out an older 
copy.

Thanks for the report...
creator: jwoolley@apache.org
